arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta reveals why he hooked Arsenal captain Martin Odegaard early during the Gunners' disappointing goalless draw against Everton
arts.sum: The decision marked the fifth consecutive league game in which Odegaard has been brought off, with last month's draw with Chelsea the last time he has seen out the 90.
Everton boss Sean Dyche says he is proud of his players and their "defensively solid" performance following their 0-0 draw against Arsenal at the Emirates.

arts.ttl: Arsenal transfer news: Mikel Arteta in 'serious danger' of £41.6m loss as contract talks stall
arts.sum: Arsenal are reportedly in 'serious danger' of losing Thomas Partey for nothing next year, as contract discussions with the midfielder's camp are not progressing.

arts.ttl: What Arsenal supporters chanted at Jordan Pickford before Everton ace's brutal title race verdict
arts.sum: Arsenal dropped points in a second consecutive Premier League game on Saturday when they were held to a goalless draw against Everton at the Emirates Stadium. For Arsenal, it further dented their title hopes as they failed to capitalise on a weekend where rivals Liverpool also dropped points in a 2-2 draw at home to Fulham.

arts.ttl: £50m star suggests he'd prefer to join Arsenal over Aston Villa despite Unai Emery connection
arts.sum: Villa and Arsenal scouted him in November...

arts.ttl: Hits and misses: Arsenal need a No 9 as Liverpool show title fight
arts.sum: For the second Premier League fixture in a row, after their 1-1 draw with Fulham, Arsenal were left to rue a failure to turn dominance into goals. But that total includes only five in the Premier League and he never looked like scoring on Saturday, registering a solitary shot across the 90 minutes.

arts.ttl: 'Very special': West Ham and Everton target wins Golden Boot as Ronaldo praises 31-goal star
arts.sum: He is a target for many Premier League clubs...

arts.ttl: “We’ll see” – Liverpool, Arsenal, Chelsea & Newcastle all on alert after €30m star’s latest comments
arts.sum: Rayan Cherki has refused to rule out a move away from Lyon in the near future, with a host of Premier League clubs showing an interest. Cherki has caught the eye with the French giants in recent years, registering 22 goals and 31 assists in 157 appearances across all competitions since emerging in 2019. Arne […] The post “We’ll see” – Liverpool, Arsenal, Chelsea & Newcastle all on alert after €30m star’s latest comments appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Arteta frustrated by poor finishing as Arsenal drop points once more
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta expressed his frustration Arsenal were unable to convert their dominance of their home match with Everton into three points as his team’s title’s hopes took another hit from a goalless draw. However, despite having 13 shots, including three from captain Martin Odegaard in the first half, Arsenal were unable to find a way past Everton goalkeeper Jordan Pickford and his defence to draw for the second weekend running, after being held 1-1 at Fulham.

arts.ttl: Arsenal face Newcastle transfer challenge as Eddie Howe launches bid for £90m star
arts.sum: Newcastle are ready to challenge Arsenal and Premier League leaders Liverpool in the January transfer window, despite Eddie Howe's concerns over the Magpies compliance with financial rules
